record.dc:title: 50BT2, 15BT2, Butler County, Kentucky. Annis Mound. Fea. 22 and 22B, Fire Basins.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Late Prehistoric Mississippian Sites in Kentucky
record.wpa:narrative: Features 22 and 22B are fire basins superimposed but not on the same center. The eastern 2/3 of F# 22, the later basin are seen in upper right. F# 22B, the earlier basin, has rectangular corners, a slightly greater width, a somewhat shallower depth. The compact white ash bed is pictured here, as well as a trailer, which testifies to the order of their superimposition. See also photos 36, 37, 51. View from southwest.
